title: Interactive Exercise
description:
Create a log parser that extracts:
1. Timestamp (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)
2. Log level (INFO, WARNING, ERROR)
3. Message
From log lines like: "2024-01-15 10:30:45 [ERROR] Database connection failed"
instructions:
Create a log parser that extracts:
1. Timestamp (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)
2. Log level (INFO, WARNING, ERROR)
3. Message
From log lines like: "2024-01-15 10:30:45 [ERROR] Database connection failed"

commonMistakes.correction: Add : at the end of the line
